document.full_text: the vancouver canucks opened their playoffs campaign with a 2-0 victory over the defending stanley cup champion chicago blackhawks on wednesday, goalie roberto luongo chipping in with 32 saves for the west top seeds.
document.title: luongo helps canucks blank blackhawks in opener
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks opened their playoffs campaign with a 2-0 victory over the defending stanley cup champion chicago blackhawks on wednesday, goalie roberto luongo chipping in with 32 saves for the west top seeds.
